section.p: Before an external billing system can be registered and used for services in , the following steps need to be performed:

ol.li: A billing adapter needs to be implemented that connects with the external billing system. This task is carried out by a developer in tight cooperation with the supplier of the services that are to use the external billing system. You can find a detailed description of this task in the Developer's Guide.

The providers of the billing adapter are responsible for its deployment on an application server and for ensuring the communication with on the one side and the billing system on the other. This may, for example, involve the appropriate configuration of firewalls and access paths.

You as the operator of must obtain the parameters for connecting to the billing adapter from its providers. must be able to address the remote interface of the billing adapter by means of JNDI (Java Naming and Directory Interface) lookup.
